ISSUE.TITLE: Spec attribute with a specified color option - shows the color square even in Custom Text values
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.0 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go to specification attribute > color > edit > value > select any value (For Example Green.) 2. Set color RGB Code (For Green - #008000) 3. Save 4. Go to product edit page > Specification attribute and add new specification attribute 5. Select Custom text and in attribute drop-down select color 6. Set custom Value as "Blue" and Enable for display on Product detail page and save 7. Open that product detail page. As it custom text, so on product detail page it should be written in "Blue" in text for color, but it displays the color box with Green (#008000) color.
